WRITING.TEXT: I mean that's a morbid picture no doubt, but an artist creates something with intention to create an emotion. Is it wrong to use morbid visuals to convey an emotion/idea?

WRITING.TEXT: I see what you're saying for sure. But I think subtle grainy texture or maybe a very light color would help it looked more finished
I like the idea a lot, but the empty space just makes it feel unfinished. Maybe if you just added some texture to it or something of that sort it'd look a great deal better

WRITING.TITLE: Can someone explain the EAC thing and why there's so much fuss about it?

WRITING.TEXT: Love the support man, couldn't possibly express how something as small as "good work" drives me to do more. I'm glad you like it!

I think I just felt kind of meaningless in the moment, not like suicidal just kind of like life is pointless, and came up with this to show that. I love to hear that it evoked multiple feelings in you, I do want my work to make people feel something
